long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Vera Browser Extension will enhance a users Sharepoint workflow by allowing the user to select a Vera secured file within Sharepoint (on-premised and online) and have the file automatically open with the native application on the users desktop. When a user makes edits to the document (assuming the user has editing rights) and saves changes, the changes will be saved back to Sharepoint.
